OOC: I just wanted to let you knwo that I fixed a little error in 
Nightmenaces bio. Apparently it made you think he was with Iron Raptor 
but he's not.  Daydreamer is a Maximal who isn't yet in any subfaction 
and Night menace is part of ummmm I know this one.

BIC: Rhesus realized what his friend was up to and politely declined 
not wanting to give it away on the slim chance Gorzo was still awake 
(I believe Hugar gave him to LN HELLLLLOOOOO).
